Question & Options:
In the 2006 movie 'Jaan-E-Mann', which character was played by Salman Khan and was married to Piya Goyal Kapoor?
Options:
A. Suhaan Kapoor
B. Raj Malhotra
C. Vikram Singh
D. Arjun Singh

In the 2006 movie 'Jaan-E-Mann', which character is played by Preity Zinta?
Options:
A. Piya Goyal Kapoor
B. Preity Zintacova
C. Both Piya Goyal Kapoor and Preity Zintacova
D. None of the above
Correct Answer: Both Piya Goyal Kapoor and Preity Zintacova
